function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of spatial flexibility and independent supplies in dwellings","Impact":"Limited adaptability to changing needs and activities, potential for overcrowding","Mitigation":"Design flexible and adaptable spaces, provide independent supplies for each space","Technologies":"Modular furniture, smart home technology, independent energy and internet systems","People":"Residents, urban dwellers","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building developers"},{"Description":"Poor indoor environmental quality and associated health risks","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory illnesses, reduced quality of life","Mitigation":"Improve access to natural lighting, ventilation, and clean air, comply with regulations for thermal insulation and noise control","Technologies":"Energy-efficient HVAC systems, air purifiers, smart ventilation systems","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Lack of stable access to resources for telework and daily living","Impact":"Disruption of telework, limited access to essential resources for daily living","Mitigation":"Ensure universal and stable access to power, internet, and digital resources","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, telecommunication infrastructure, digital access solutions","People":"Teleworkers, urban residents","Owner":"Government, telecommunication companies, utilities"}]}
